name: The Name of the Hose
description:
The Name of the Hose tells the Story of the gnome Precious Bubblegum and his quest to save his village from a dangerous beast that lives across the sea!

For our AdventureJam 2020 entry we went with a hand-painted watercolor art style, inspired by children's books.

Have fun playing!

Credits:

Design, Character Art, Programming: Joel Mayer

Design, Background Art, Dialogues: Matt Frith

His Twitter

Original Tune "Drystone Theme" by Robert Potter

soundcloud.com/octarob
